questions.text: Who did the boy in the cold opening want to take out?
questions.explanation:
Ann Marie.

	Ann Marie was one of Carla's children. Nick Tortelli is her father.

questions.text: Complete this line spoken by Norm: "It's a dog-eat-dog world and I'm wearing ____."
questions.explanation:
Milk Bone underwear.

	Norm was always ready with a quick reply when the people ask him how he is. Everyday when Norm came in everyone yells "Norm!" followed by Diane saying "Norman."

questions.text: What did Frasier have a slide show of?
questions.correct: Diane and his trip to Europe
options: The almost wedding between him and Diane
Famous psychiatrists of the western world
questions.explanation:
Diane and his trip to Europe.

	At first no one wanted to see the slide shows. But then they are told they can laugh and make stupid noises at them, so they agree to watch them.

questions.text: Who came to the bar to see Norm?
questions.explanation:
Jeff.

	Jeff was played by Chip Zien. Chip Zien once played the Baker in "Into to the Woods" on Broadway.

questions.text: What job was Norm up for?
questions.explanation:
Account manager.

	Norm's first career was an accountant. He was often unemployed however, but in this show not only did he have a job, he was up for the promotion. In other episodes he had been a painter, and in one episode, for a brief time, he was a beer taster.

questions.text: What did Norm find out about the other person up for the promotion?
questions.correct: He was having an affair with the boss's wife.
options: He was really bad at math.
He stole money from the company.
He doesn't own a good suit.
questions.explanation:
He was having an affair with the boss's wife.

	Norm thought about using this information to help him secure the promotion. But in the end Norm decides to do the fight thing and try to get the promotion on his own merits.

No.

	It was a close race between the two candidates. In the end, however, Norm lost to the other man.

questions.text: What is the reason that Norm did or didn't get the job?
questions.correct: Vera didn't fit in with the other wives.
questions.explanation:
Vera didn't fit in with the other wives.

	The man told Norm if they just had some reason that the other man shouldn't get the promotion Norm would get it. Norm could not bring himself to rat the other man out however, so he was stuck with his same job, no promotion.

questions.text: What did Norm tell Vera about the job?
questions.correct: He was just not the right man for the job.
options: The other women didn't care for her.
She was a hit with the other women.
questions.explanation:
He was just not the right man for the job.

	Norm spared Vera's feelings by saying it was his fault he didn't get the job instead of telling her the real reason. Norm once again has shown that despite what he says about her, he really loves his wife.

Daniel Davis.

	Davis was born in Arkansas on November 26, 1945. He is probably best known as Niles on "The Nanny".
